## TextAreaBuilderOptions.promptStyle property

Style for the prompt.

**Signature:**

```typescript
promptStyle?: Style;
```

## Remarks

Uses `Style` from `@boba-cli/chapstick` to apply terminal colors and formatting to the prompt.
